channel.title: When i click 'runserver.bat' It comes up as; 'Exception in thread "main" jav
channel.description:
When i click on 'runserver.bat' , Its says
'Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server'
And When I go onto 'Compiler.bat'
'Please choose an option below to do that function. Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for any updates that I post.
c - Compile your server. r - To Run your server. e - To exit out of the program. jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive. color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
Option: .... '
It comes up with that, I enter 'r' to run my server and it says;
'Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server'
Again,
Any ideas on how i can sort this out as i am clueless as to how to sort it out? :S
Cheers. Grant.

item.title: When i click 'runserver.bat' It comes up as; 'Exception in thread "main" jav
item.dc:creator: @Grantypeno Grantypeno
item.description:
@Grantypeno wrote:

Ooer,
Thanks it worked.

<3

item.title: When i click 'runserver.bat' It comes up as; 'Exception in thread "main" jav
item.dc:creator: @Grantypeno Grantypeno
item.description:
@Grantypeno wrote:

When i click on ‘runserver.bat’ ,
Its says

‘Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server’

And When I go onto ‘Compiler.bat’

'Please choose an option below to do that function.
Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
any updates that I post.

c - Compile your server.
r - To Run your server.
e - To exit out of the program.
jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive.
color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler.
reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.

Option: … ’

It comes up with that, I enter ‘r’ to run my server and it says;

‘Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server’

Again,

Any ideas on how i can sort this out as i am clueless as to how to sort it out? :S

Cheers.
Grant.
